title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part relates to public access to records of the Office
for People With Developmental Disabilities (hereinafter referred to as OPWDD)
and its operated and/or certified facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
603.1

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
